original_text: I myself did not know him, but for this purpose I came baptizing with water, that he might be revealed to Israel.”
korean_text: 나도 그를 알지 못하였으나 내가 와서 물로 세례를 베푸는 것은 그를 이스라엘에 나타내려 함이라 하니라

sentences.original_text: I myself did not know him
but for this purpose I came baptizing with water
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이 일을 위해 내가 물로 세례를 베풀러 왔다

sentences.original_text: that he might be revealed to Israel
